artist: artist: Unknown Italian (Bologna), 17th century; artist: Copy after (and formerly attributed to) Agostino Carracci
description: recto: head and bust of male figure in profile seen slightly from below, study of hand and sleeve deeply foreshortened
inscription:
Inscriptions, recto
Upper right corner, in brown ink: [N1908.]
Lower right corner, in brown ink: [Agostino]
title: Studies of a Head and a Foreshortened Hand
